sentences.en: You will need a pot of broth for poaching.
sentences.cn: 你需要用一锅汤来煮食物。

sentences.en: Pour in some of the broth, but not all of it, because it will probably overflow.
sentences.cn: 倒入部分肉汤，不要全部，因为很可能会溢出来。

sentences.en: A few minutes later the waitress carried over a heavy bowl full of broth and I quickly dug in.
sentences.cn: 几分钟后，女服务员端过来一大碗肉汤，我很快就吃了起来。
